body: You are skilled at using meta words to enhance your wordcasting ability.
name: Meta Word Mastery
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Words of Power/Meta Word Mastery

sections.body: You can use meta words three additional times per day. In addition, select one additional meta word and add it to your spellbook, familiar, or list of words known.
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Words of Power/Meta Word Mastery/Benefit
